segments.text: I see the woman is so absorbed in drying that plate, she doesn’t notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s funny how she’s standing in water and doesn’t even realize it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids planned this distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like laughing at how oblivious she is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is smarter for not climbing up there herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water is just spreading everywhere, and she’s still polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it’ll take her to finally look down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids are going to get away with it if she doesn’t turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is the most chaotic kitchen scene I’ve ever seen.
segments.speaker: PAR
